knimeNode.name: Named Entity Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters terms which are set modifiable or unmodifiable, respectively.

fullDescription.intro: Filters all terms which are set modifiable or unmodifiable, respectively (as specified in the dialog).
fullDescription.option: If checked, modifiable terms are filtered otherwise unmodifiable.
If deep preprocessing is checked, the terms contained inside the documents are filtered too, this means that the documents are changed, which is more time consuming.

dataIn.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.dataIn: The input table which contains the terms to convert.

dataOut.name: Filtered terms and related documents output table

ports.dataOut: The output table which contains the preprocessed terms.
